meanings.definition: The fact or state of happening or existing
meanings.sent1: Many occurrences of rain were observed last week.
meanings.sent2: The occurrences of birds chirping in the morning are delightful.
meanings.sent3: The occurrences of cats chasing their tails always bring a smile.
meanings.sent4: The occurrences of stars aligning perfectly symbolize rare opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The occurrences of thunderstorms can be both frightening and mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: An instance of something happening or being present
meanings.sent1: The unexpected occurrences of laughter brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: She noted the occurrences of cars passing by her window.
meanings.sent3: The occurrences of squirrels stealing nuts never fail to amuse.
meanings.sent4: His sudden disappearance was one of the mysterious occurrences.
meanings.sent5: The rare occurrences of shooting stars are magical to witness.
